title: PDF Protector 1.5.1 – Easily encrypt and decrypt PDF documents
content: PDF Protector is an easy to use utility to encrypt or decrypt your PDF documents.   Features Supports Adobe Standard 40-bit Encryption and Adobe Advanced 128-bit Encryption. Password protect opening of the document. Unlock password protected documents. Prevent printing of the document. Prevent copying and changes to the document. Easy to use. Compatible with all […]

title: PrismaLog 1.4 – Log time in task,story,project
content: PrimaLog helps you to track the time spent per project, story and task. title: DoublePane 1.8 – Reposition windows effortlessly
content: DoublePane is an effortless window positioning helper.   Have you ever wasted time repositioning application windows so you can see two windows simultaneously? Do you struggle to move and resize windows so that they don’t overlap?   DoublePane effortlessly repositions application windows to maximize your screen space for easy side-by-side viewing.   With one click, […]

title: MacGourmet Deluxe 4.3.0 – Easily create, build and share your recipe collection
content: With MacGourmet Deluxe, you can easily create, build, and share your recipe collection. Make notes about your favorite wines; plan meals for a day or a week and then sync to iCal. title: TablePlus 3.11.0 – Modern, native tool for relational databases
content: TablePlus is a modern, native, and friendly tool for relational databases.   Features: Native, Fast, and Secured: Query, edit, and save your database easily with a native app that can run fast like a lambo. It’s also equipped with many security features to protect your database, including native libssh and TLS to encrypt your connection. […]

title: GPG Suite 2020.2 – OpenPGP on macOS
content: GPG Suite (was GPGTools Installer) is an open source installer for OS X. title: FotoMagico 5.6.14 – Powerful slideshow creator with multi-app integration
